name: Visual Scripting Platformer!
description:
Welcome to my first game! 

I know it isn't much, but I put a lot of time into it so I hope you enjoy!

Please donate so that I may buy better equipment, software, etc. so that I can make better games for you all!

Please comment your thoughts and give honest feedback so that I can make updates to the game!

Special Thanks To Code Monkey for their awesome tutorial on udemy.com for teaching me how Visual Scripting works and teaching me new skills everyday!

Special Thanks To Muz Station Productions for the awesome soundtrack!

Controls:

Left/Right arrows- movement

Spacebar- Jump

Spacebar 2x- Double Jump
